'''1.20.3 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20.3-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.3]], released on November 30, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-3-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20.3 Release Candidate 1|November 30, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a bug.
